thread.section_title: Royal Park Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Dirty, Scary, but great location
thread.title_full: Dirty, Scary, but great location - Review of Royal Park Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: LaylT
title: Dirty, Scary, but great location
text: Right next to the train station but reeked of marijuana, scary because of so many random people and you never know what's around you, scary people, I got bit twice on my face after waking up. You do share the bathroom with everyone else on the floor but you have your own room and sink in your room. Oh, only 2 outlets worked and there is the tv, fridge (don't forget to plug it in yourself), your chargers, heater, microwave, more than 2 outlets worth. Not many channels. Not for long stays. Heater made a LOT of scary noises.
